mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.siji_uuid_number as sijiUuidNumber ,a.siji_name as sijiName ,a.siji_phone as sijiPhone ,a.siji_id_number as sijiIdNumber ,a.siji_photo as sijiPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.siji_email as sijiEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM siji a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.siji_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.sijiUuidNumber},'%')
and a.siji_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.sijiName},'%')
and a.siji_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.sijiPhone},'%')
and a.siji_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.sijiIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.siji_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.sijiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
